svg.text: EyAi Inspect — Smart Inspection Glasses Data Flow
Real-time AR overlay on lens display
Receives live glass feed via BLE
Edge pre-processing: dedup, blur detect, orient
Queues upload batch per roof facet
Offline mode: cache locally, sync when connected
Live AR overlay data pushed back to glasses
One-Click Outputs From Glass Inspection Data:
PDF Report | Carrier Submission | Client Portal Share | Supplement Package
REAL-TIME AR OVERLAY — What the Pro Sees Through the Glasses
Hands-free roof inspection device with real-time AI
damage identification routed to org-scoped SaaS account
Real-time GPT-4o inference displayed as augmented
reality overlay on wearable lens during roof inspection
AR-guided inspection workflow adapting required photo
set per insurance carrier's documentation rules
Natural language voice commands during inspection
auto-linked to GPS-tagged photo with STT transcription
Edge-cached inspection data with automatic cloud
sync when connectivity restored, zero data loss
line items, PDF report, and carrier submission package
SkaiScraper / EyAi Inspect — ClearSkai Technologies LLC — Provisional Patent Reference — February 2026
